data.text: @LFPress The testing requirements are a joke especially for short trips. Labs along the border are making a killing as they are not charging any less for these antigen tests than they were for PCRs.
@funmidniterider @LFPress Then you got lucky because all the stories and experiences I’ve had are the opposite. Turn back & wait for test results or risk 6k+ fine.
@LFPress When you get there in the US border guys don’t even ask for it after you’ve spent 40 bucks for everyone in your family
